Talk_Iga_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Hm. I see that you are well-supplied with
mighty bananas already. Good. It is wise
to be so readily prepared for anything.<sp:0:4:0>Your reward instead will be some rupees.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh my! To think that you'd want to chat
this early in the day. I'm flattered.

Let's talk later. I'm a little busy now,
all right?
Talk_Iga_13:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Sigh_00>All blademasters should be so thoroughly
prepared for battle. I expect great things
from you.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>And with that...<sp:5:1:0>let the exam begin!
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's gotten quite late. Could we chat
tomorrow? I'm exhausted, but rest will
restore my sociability.
Balloon_02: I just want to go home...
Talk_Iga_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>What you must do is travel to the five
frogs and make an offering of <clr:0000>mighty
bananas<clr:ffff> to each one.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Let's put this off until a little later.
There's somewhere I need to be.
Talk_Iga_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand_01>This harsh land will lash you mercilessly
with its cold and heat. Your travels may
prove your end. But if you succeed...
I will name you a blademaster.


Furthermore, I will personally give you
these mighty bananas.
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I was able to share my recipes, and I'm
ready to head back, but...

Well, I'm worried about the Yiga Clan
in Gerudo Canyon.

What could they be up to?
Door_02: <sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkDeny_01><sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200>I have nothing to say to those not of the Yiga.<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Wow! <sp:5:0:0>You took a blademaster exam...


<sp:3:0:2:0700>That's a really scary story, but I suppose
that's not very common when someone is
just traveling normally.
As long as I'm careful, it sounds like
I should be OK getting back.

Thanks for telling me what happened.
Talk_Iga_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal>Hmm. I feel like I know you from
somewhere, but I'm drawing a blank.<sp:0:4:0>But who you are is not important.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Understand_00>Though members of the Yiga Clan should
take care to keep themselves presentable.
Talk_Iga_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>This is the Yiga Blademaster Station.


It is where Yiga blademasters are made
and unmade.

You braved the elements to take this first
step. That speaks well of your passion to
become a blademaster.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>But my exam is more rigorous still. <sp:5:1:0>Do you
have it within you to succeed? Will you try
and give it your all?
Talk_Iga_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>Oh, wonderful! Well, then...


Listen closely to my words. The test is
unforgiving. This is what you must do.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand_00>In Gerudo Canyon, there are five <clr:0000>frog
statues<clr:ffff> with the identifying marks of the
Yiga Clan.
I will reveal the locations.
Talk_Iga_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sigh_00>I have no more bananas to give for now.<sp:5:1:0>
If you need more, a true blademaster is
expected to find their own.
<sp:3:0:2:0901>Now! <sp:5:1:0>Let the test begin!
Talk_Iga_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Understand_00>Finally, you have returned after making
the necessary offerings. <sp:5:1:0>My intelligence
sources have confirmed it.
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Admiration_01>You pass the blademaster exam!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


<sp:3:0:2:0701>I have a reward for your assuming the
mantle of blademaster. You are permitted
to step into the inner sanctum.
This reward is valuable and only found
in the Depths. You should know that it
is a great honor to receive one.<sp:0:4:0>Pay no heed to the strange glowing ruins
you may find inside. <sp:5:1:0>We haven't yet
decided what to do about them.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand_01>What's important is your hard work in
overcoming the blademaster exam.
All glory to Master Kohga!
Talk_Iga_05:
<sp:0:2:2:7d00><sp:3:0:2:0900>Wait!<sp:0:2:2:6400>


No one is allowed in there until they have
passed the blademaster exam.
Talk_Iga_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The blademaster exam can be challenging.
As someone who knows it inside and out,
I have one piece of advice.
If you cannot find a frog statue,
challenge yourself...to think things
through from a different angle.
A blademaster must be able to take a
broad view of a problem.
Talk_Iga_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Understand>I see. If your wish is to contribute to the
Yiga Clan cause from the front lines, I can
respect that.
However...if you want to make a more
significant contribution, then return here
and attempt the blademaster exam.
Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I really want to go back, but I'm worried
about traveling...
Talk_Iga_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>It's a very honorable thing to serve
Master Kohga as a blademaster.<sp:0:4:0>The exam is rigorous, but will you make
the attempt for his sake anyway?
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Oh, I'm sorry. <sp:5:0:0>I was so lost in thought that
I didn't notice you.

Originally, I came here to share my prized
recipes with people.

With that done, I was going to head home.
But I've heard some scary rumors.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Apparently, the Yiga Clan has been
spotted behind a waterfall along the
road in Gerudo Canyon.
They've got to be up to no good in there.<sp:5:1:0>
*sigh* How can I head back with that
weighing on my mind?<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_Iga_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Tell yourself to stay calm when you need
to focus. <sp:5:1:0>That focus will help you make
haste as you complete the offerings.
A blademaster must be able to call upon
calm and haste as needed.<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>What could the Yiga Clan be doing there?
Nothing good, that's for sure.

<sp:3:0:2:0301>Be careful if you're going to pass through
Gerudo Canyon, OK?

Especially around that new waterfall along
the road with the suspicious entrance
behind it.
Talk_Iga_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The Yiga Clan is expanding. We can
always use a few more outstanding
blademasters.
See the exam through and you could be
of great service to Master Kohga.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad>I was able to share my recipes, and I'm
ready to head back, but I'm worried
about the Yiga Clan sightings.
<sp:3:0:2:0300>You should be careful if you pass through
Gerudo Canyon.

Especially around the new waterfall along
the road. <sp:5:1:0>I saw a suspicious-looking
entrance there.
It makes you wonder what in the world
they're up to...<sp:5:1:0>
